snippet: After nine years, the CBS comedy tried to wrap up its many loose ends Monday night. The audience of 12.9 million was the show’s largest.
abstract: Finale of CBS hit comedy series How I Met Your Mother posts best-ever ratings in show's history, with 12.9 million viewers; numbers, falling short of 15.7 million viewers watching season finale of AMC series The Walking Dead, illustrate both shift away from broadcast television and networks' ability to attract broad audiences when they elevate show to level of event.
lead_paragraph: After nine years, the CBS comedy tried to wrap up its many loose ends Monday night. The audience of 12.9 million was the show’s largest.

headline.main: ‘How I Met Your Mother’ Gets Its Best Ratings for Finale
headline.print_headline: The Series Finale of ‘Mother’ Brings Cable-Style Viewership

keywords.value: How I Met Your Mother (TV Program)
